channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report X-2024021454
item.description:
Report X-2024021454

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-01T18:14:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-16
  • City: BATON ROUGE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat package was found sitting in the unload area damaged and leaking on pallet. Package was placed into a red hazardous tote; and moved to the hazmat cage for inspection. DescribePack: While inspecting the hazmat there was no inner packing materials inside; and the plastic bottle cap was missing causing liquid to spill out into box. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat package was placed into a red hazardous tote and moved to hazmat cage for inspection. After inspecting. Damaged items were placed in a white drum for preparation to next hub for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024021535
item.description:
Report X-2024021535

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-17
  • City: BATON ROUGE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found damaged wet on the bottom of package. The package was placed in a red bin by QA and transported to the hazmat area to be processed properly. DescribePack: The bottle of acid was found in a plastic bag with some strap on the cap. The bottle leaked a little in the bag and it deteriorate wetting up the box. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in red bin and brought to hazmat cage to be processed properly.
